summary: This module offers a unified interface for generating text embeddings using Google Vertex AI, supporting both synchronous and asynchronous calls. It translates OpenAI‑style embedding requests into Vertex AI's required format, manages options like automatic truncation, task selection, and document titles, and converts Vertex AI responses back into OpenAI‑compatible structures.
business_intent: Enable applications to obtain high‑quality text embeddings from Vertex AI while maintaining compatibility with OpenAI API conventions, facilitating seamless integration of Vertex AI embedding capabilities into existing workflows.
